Mark Your Calendars! The Next Blue Moon Arrives on May 31, 2026 - Gadgets 360
summary:
Mark Your Calendars! The Next Blue Moon Arrives on May 31, 2026

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Gadgets360

A Blue Moon, a term often associated with rarity, will next occur on May 31, 2026. This event refers to the second full moon within a single calendar month, arising due to the lunar cycle of approximately 29.5 days.

  • The upcoming Blue Moon will be of the monthly variety.
  • The last Blue Moon was recorded on August 19, 2024.
  • The term Blue Moon does not mean the moon turns blue.
Instances of the moon appearing blue are exceedingly rare.

The next seasonal Blue Moon is anticipated on August 21, 2032.
newTitle: Mark Your Calendars! The Next Blue Moon Arrives on May 31, 2026

title: POCO X7 Review: Great build, even better value - CNBCTV18
summary:
POCO X7 Review: Great build, even better value

Publication Date: 2025
Source: CNBC TV18

POCO started 2025 strong with the launch of the X7 smartphone, which provides excellent features at an attractive price.

The POCO X7 features a 50MP triple-camera, an ergonomic design, and a vibrant 6.67-inch AMOLED display. It stands out in the market for its combination of performance, camera capabilities, and build quality.

  • Affordable pricing starting at ₹21,999
  • Lightweight design at 190 grams, 8.63 mm thick
  • IP66, IP68, and IP69 ratings for dust and water resistance
  • Triple-camera setup: 50MP primary, 8MP ultrawide, and 2MP macro
  • 6.67-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate
  • 5,500mAh battery with 45W fast charging
“The POCO X7 5G is a well-rounded smartphone with a premium design and excellent display.”

The POCO X7 is positioned as a strong contender in its price range, offering notable features and performance, making it appealing for budget-conscious consumers.

The Vision Pro 2 might debut between autumn 2025 and spring 2026, featuring Apple’s next-gen M5 chipset and improvements to its user interface.

Affordable Vision Pro Model in Development

Apple is also working on a budget-friendly variant of the headset, which may be launched after 2027 with cost-saving compromises.

title: AI has venture investors excited about (yes) accounting firms - Mint

summary:
AI Drives Venture Capital Interest in Accounting Firms

Publication Date: N/A Source: Mint

Venture capitalists are increasingly investing in accounting firms as the industry embraces AI technology, moving beyond traditional tech startups.

  • Venture firms like Bessemer Venture Partners, General Catalyst, and Thrive Capital are acquiring stakes in accounting firms.
  • The trend is emerging alongside recent private equity deals, signaling a transformation in the accounting sector.
  • The shift highlights the growing importance of AI and technology in traditional business operations.
“Venture capitalists are known for betting on risky, moonshot technology. But recently, some of them are heading to a quiet hamlet of the business world: accounting firms.”

This trend indicates a significant change in how venture capitalists perceive the potential of accounting, opening doors for innovation in the sector.
newTitle: AI Drives Venture Capital Interest in Accounting Firms

title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim: What to expect from the rumoured upcoming device - CNBCTV18
summary:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim: What to expect from the rumoured upcoming device

Publication Date: January 2024, Source: CNBC TV18

The Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim is anticipated to be unveiled during the first Unpacked event of the year on January 22. Set between the Galaxy S25+ and S25 Ultra, this model promises high-end performance with a sleek design.

  • Expected thickness of just 6.5mm, making it quite slim compared to most smartphones.
  • Features a 6.66-inch display and powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
  • Battery capacity estimated between 4,700mAh and 5,000mAh.
  • Camera system includes a 200MP main camera, a 50MP ultrawide camera, and a telephoto lens with 3.5x optical zoom, borrowing features from the S25 Ultra.
  • Pricing details are unclear, but expected to be positioned between the S25+ and S25 Ultra.
  • Availability likely in the second quarter of the year.
"The main camera will feature a 200MP ISOCELL HP5 sensor—likely an upgrade from the S25+ and a closer match to the Ultra model."

The Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim is generating buzz among fans, especially with its innovative camera features and slim profile, setting the stage for future designs in the Galaxy lineup.
newTitle: Anticipating the Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim: Features and Expectations
